channel.title: Derps Grand Idea - Day Four (10/18)
channel.description:
# Welcome to SFoL - Derps ~~not so~~ Grand Idea!
Hosted by @SirDerpsAlot with @DatBird as the co-host
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. May also use WoTM for activity if need be. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. Lets all have fun and play together! 9. Do not edit or delete made posts. 10. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 48 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Mafia faction will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * Any dead interaction will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and night will begin.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
## Classlist
![|20x20](https://forum.imperium42.com/user_avatar/forum.imperium42.com/luxy/40/18622_2.png) [SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-grand-idea-class-thread-v2/78691) [Forum of Lies](https://forum.imperium42.com/c/forum-matches/forum-of-lies)
> Rules: Every post here must contain a class. It could be an existing one or something new. If the class is an existing FoL class, the name is simply enough to qualify it. If it is a class that is already in this thread, put down the name hyperlinked to the post in this thread that includes its class card. Otherwise you must make the entire class card. Classes must adhere to [this format](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-template/47799). (Although for Blue Dragon classes, the objective can instead read “ Your objective is to defeat the scum fact…
# Playerlist
1. Marshal 2. Psquid 3. ~~Arete~~ **Neutral** 4. Kai 5. ~~Esquid~~ **Mafia A** 6. Katze 7. Jake 8. ~~Possed~~ > Shurian 9. ~~Mist~~ **Town** 10. ~~PKR~~ **Town** 11. Italy 12. ~~Pug~~ **Town** 13. Andrej 14. Wazz 15. ~~Simon~~ Neutral 16. ~~Moustache~~ **Town** 17. ~~Geyde~~ **Town** 18. Diggity
# Backups:
1. Napoleon 2. HTM
# Spectators
1. Nebrins 2. Jgoes 3. Merc
## Special Mechanics:
* All players in the game will submit between 1-2 special mechanics through a google fourm. * A few (exact number undecided) will be rolled and used in the game. * Submissions may be semi-bastard but will not be used if deemed overly bastard * Any attempt to submit purposely unfun or game-breaking mechanics may be punished.
## Notes That Should Be Read:
* WoTM will be used when rolling in order to prevent broken classes, as well as to limit super confirmable classes. * The game will be rolled similar to VMMM with x Town, x Mafia, and x Any. Before classes are rolled I will post the exact numbers. * When rolling classes their is a 20% chance for a new mafia faction to be created every time a mafia member is rolled, with a maximum of 2 mafia factions * If a mafia faction does not roll a killing member, a faction kill will instead be given to the faction.
## Alignment list Leader Town Town Town Town Town Town Town Town Town Town Scum (NK or Mafia) Scum Scum Any (Town, Mafia, Any Neutral) Any Any Any
# wincons
# Town: *Defeat the mafia and any neutral who seek to do you harm*
# Mafia: *Gain plurality with the town and defeat any neutrals who may seek to do you harm*

item.title: Derps Grand Idea - Day Four (10/18)
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
I mean, I still am in general against GI.

It usually ends up being canned or demotivating one of the teams to the point where noone plays anymore.

It’s literally just bad.

Roles are unbalanced, wild, making it all confusing and at some point… not enjoyable anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Derps Grand Idea - Day Four (10/18)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
idea.
GI game using another forum’s GI thread, without linking to said thread.
would get people to really start using their heads around closed mechanics. what would the host allow? how would they interpret it? how would two weird things interact?

now, some people would say making “reads” on the host is a no-no. and they’re allowed to have that opinion. however i will say this is not always the case. sometimes it leans toward my stance, where how the host makes decisions and how they process the wording of the cards is all part of The Game™
because for me, it feels very similar to how i assume reads for yall does, except its a lot more accessible to me, as the goals and motivations of the host are not the unknowns, the actions are.

Read full topic

item.description:
well sometimes its fine, actually. its just. it generally has to be a step removed, i.e. something that you concluded (and not something you were directly told).
so no innocent childs, no justicar messages, etc.
